review:
Dr. Shikha Mahajan is a learned doctor and we are associated with her from the day our daughter came into our life.

She is amazing Doctor and treats her patients like her kids and give personal attention.

Thanks

My brother son 1.5 yr old suffer from viral fever  and severe bacterial infection for 4 days with high body temperature (101-104) .Dr shikhar didn't responded appropriately and the kid landed in hospital .It's been 6 days and the treatment is still on.i believe being a child's specialist she should be more sensitive and professional.Very casual attitude.i wouldn't recommend.

Visited Dr as was directed by our Gynaec. Little did we know that Dr is keen on sharing our home stories and less interested in listening to the patient's issues. Wonder where she finds the comparison from! Apart from the rest,*** ***** *********** ****** ** ********** ** **** ***** ** ******** *** ** *******,she won't answer politely,won't answer any of your queries and keep singing to her tunes. Please save ur time and effort and find better Dr .
She will never listen to u ... u have doubts just keep with u ... she is charging more the. Mrp on kids vaccination

Visited the dr. In Blk hospital where she is a faculty.
First of all, if you are educated and have certain skills and is blessed by God that you can do public service then you should be thankful and should behave nicely with patients. But dr. Sikha do not know how to respect others and how to talk.
If her patients speak with her in the same manner as she does then probably she would realise how bad it feels.
May be one day she realises this.
